alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oakland and northwestern Macomb Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pontiac, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Troy around 400 PM EDT. Rochester around 405 PM EDT. Romeo, Sterling Heights and Clinton around 415 PM EDT. Mount Clemens and Macomb Township around 420 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Rochester Hills, Lakeville, Waterford, Stoney Creek Metro Park, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Lake Orion, Utica, Washington and Auburn Hills. People attending Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
